Breitbart: com published a report claiming that the Clinton Foundation made donations to Antifa International and Unite Against Fascism, totaling more than $7.1 million.
The Clinton Foundation: s official IRS Form 990s, available on their website, do not show any donations to anti-fascist groups.
The Last Line of Defense website: which published the original claim, is a satirical publication that presents fiction as fact and openly admits that their sources do not exist.
